Uses of Interface
org.kitteh.irc.client.library.ClientBuilder

  • Packages that use ClientBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.kitteh.irc.client.library
    Kitteh IRC Client Library!

    • Uses of ClientBuilder in org.kitteh.irc.client.library

      Methods in org.kitteh.irc.client.library that return ClientBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.afterBuildConsumer(Consumer<Client> consumer)
      Sets up a Consumer to fire on the newly created client after it is built, prior to connection.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.afterBuildConsumerRemove()
      Removes the Consumer set to fire after the client is built.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.bindHost(String host)
      Binds the client to a host or IP locally.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.bindHostRemove()
      Binds the client to no specific host.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.bindPort(int port)
      Binds the client to the specified port.
      static ClientBuilder Client.builder()
      Creates a ClientBuilder to build clients.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenException(Consumer<Exception> listener)
      Sets a listener for all thrown exceptions on this client.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenExceptionRemove()
      Removes the exception listener from this builder.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenInput(Consumer<String> listener)
      Sets a listener for all incoming messages from the server.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenInputRemove()
      Removes the input listener from this builder.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenOutput(Consumer<String> listener)
      Sets a listener for all outgoing messages to the server.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenOutputRemove()
      Removes the output listener from this builder.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.messageDelay(int delay)
      Sets the delay between messages being sent to the server
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.name(String name)
      Names the client, for internal labeling.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.nick(String nick)
      Sets the client's nick.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.realName(String name)
      Sets the realname the client uses.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secure(boolean ssl)
      Sets whether the client connects via SSL.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secureKey(File keyFile)
      Sets the private key for SSL connection.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secureKeyCertChain(File keyCertChainFile)
      Sets the key for SSL connection.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secureKeyCertChainRemove()
      Removes the key for SSL connection.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secureKeyPassword(String password)
      Sets the private key password for SSL connection.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secureKeyPasswordRemove()
      Removes the private key password for SSL connection.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secureKeyRemove()
      Removes the private key for SSL connection.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secureTrustManagerFactory(TrustManagerFactory factory)
      Sets the TrustManagerFactory for SSL connection.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secureTrustManagerFactoryRemove()
      Removes the TrustManagerFactory for SSL connection, defaulting to the JRE factory.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.serverHost(String host)
      Sets the server host to which the client will connect.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.serverPassword(String password)
      Sets the server password.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.serverPasswordRemove()
      Removes the server password.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.serverPort(int port)
      Sets the server port to which the client will connect.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.user(String user)
      Sets the user the client connects as.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.webirc(String password, String user, String host, InetAddress ip)
      Sets all the information for, and enables, WebIRC.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.webircRemove()
      Removes WEBIRC settings from this builder.
